articles.title: India Cements shares rally nearly 14%, cross $1 billion m-cap on UltraTech deal - The Economic Times
articles.description: India Cements' shares jumped 13.7% in early Thursday, hitting a new 52-week high of Rs 299. This surge followed UltraTech Cement's approval to acquire a non-controlling 23% stake, crossing the company's market capitalization past the $1 billion mark. The deal…

articles.title: Star cluster in “Cosmic Gem” arc captured by NASA's James Webb Telescope - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The international astronomer's team at NASA has used the James Webb Telescope to discover the star clusters in the “Cosmic Gems” arc. The Cosmic Gem arc was discovered by the Hubble Space Telescope and using the advanced technology present currently in the hu…
articles.content: The international astronomer's team at NASA has used the James Webb Telescope to discover the star clusters in the Cosmic Gems arc that came into existence just 460 million years after the Big Bang.… [+1852 chars]
